Headline: CTA Train Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Info from CTA Train Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is not affected.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Information from CTA Train Tracker SM may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is unaffected.

Headline: North-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Wilson
ShortDescription: North-bound Red Line trains are standing at Wilson due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: North-bound Red Line trains are standing at Wilson due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

Headline: South-bound Red Line Service Delayed near 47th
ShortDescription: South-bound Red Line trains are standing near 47th due to a mechanical problem on a train . Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
South-bound Red Line trains are standing near 47th due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.
